Record.Description: AIDS related research with a minimum of 20% (or $100,000) research efforts related to the biology, pathogenesis, development of vaccines, epidemiology, pathophysiology, diagnosis and treatment of opportunistic infections associated with HIV infection. To include: Pneumocystosis, toxoplasmosis, cryptosporidiosis, candidiasis, cryptococcosis, mycobacteriosis, cytomegalovirus, papillomavirus, herpes simplex, JC virus, coccidioides, hairy leukoplakia, and HIV-related periodontal disease. (FMB)
